content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you, Baihu Li, for expressing interest in my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a reasonable rental price. May I know what you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay the lowest possible price. Can we start the negotiation?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Baihu Li. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Let's begin the negotiation. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month. Can you accept this price?

I am dependable and responsible, so I am sure I will pay on time and take good care of the apartment.

I also want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Mister Heine, thank you for considering my offer. I look forward to hearing your response.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you, Baihu Li, for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your commitment to paying on time and taking care of it. However, I am afraid that 700 Euros per month is not within my budget. I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine
